ISSUE.TITLE: ShipStation. Invalid "asp-for=ApiKey" attribute on configuration page
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.30 beta Steps to reproduce the problem: It's related to all multi store checkboxes on configuration page. ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/37818094/80581723-3e752680-8a16-11ea-9886-c735496aa0b9.png)

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Changed the base class for searching of migrations to MigrationBase instead of AutoReversingMigration

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #4623 Fixed problem with multi-store checkboxes on the configuration page
